thread.title: Athlete of the Week - Nolan Donley
thread.title_full: Athlete of the Week - Nolan Donley

author: Cherokee Tribune (noreply@cherokeetribune.com)
title: Athlete of the Week - Nolan Donley
text:
slideshow 
Nolan Donley - Cherokee - FootballCherokee quarterback Nolan Donley took to the air through the rain last week, setting career highs in attempts, completions and passing yards.The junior connected on 25 of 41 attempts for 269 yards one touchdown and an interception for Cherokee in a crucial 31-28 win over Region 5 rival Wheeler. How long he’s played football: 11 years Favorite thing about the sport: Getting to play with his teammates and having fun with them every week Favorite color: White Favorite movie: The Maze Runner Favorite musical artist: Zac Brown Band Dream vacation: Caribbean cruise or a trip to Hawaii Dream car: White Audi r8 Favorite sports team: Atlanta Braves Plans for after college: If he doesn’t play baseball or football, he would like to be an engineer.
